items.content_html: A small, simple and lightweight nostr timeline feed.
items.title: Yonle/nostr-feed: A small, simple and lightweight nostr timeline feed.

items.content_html: A VDOM framework for lightweight web apps, ideal for simplicity. Fast as react, it excels for straightforward sites, offering a user-friendly approach without complex setups.
items.title: babymonie/sprintui:   A VDOM framework for lightweight web apps, ideal for simplicity. Fast as react, it excels for straightforward sites, offering a user-friendly approach without complex setups.

items.content_html: SimplyMusic is a frontend alternative for YouTube Music powered by api Piped Instances. "It's lightweight, simple, and free from any extras."
items.title: IamJony/simplyMusic: SimplyMusic is a frontend alternative for YouTube Music powered by api Piped Instances. "It's lightweight, simple, and free from any extras."

items.content_html: This is a lightweight rich text editor that allows the user to make a high degree of customization of the editor's behavior.
items.title: EmptyDreams/krich: This is a lightweight rich text editor that allows the user to make a high degree of customization of the editor's behavior.

items.content_html: wc-hash-router is a lightweight and versatile hash-based router library designed specifically for web components. Empower your web applications with seamless navigation and dynamic content loading, all while maintaining clean and modular code with the power of web components.
items.title: gen2tech/wc-hash-router: wc-hash-router is a lightweight and versatile hash-based router library designed specifically for web components. Empower your web applications with seamless navigation and dynamic content loading, all while maintaining clean and modular code with the power of web components.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.

items.content_html: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.
